page.title: 18Auchtertyre Farm
page.content: Mr.Robert Steel is the tenant farmer and he has eight workers to help him farm his large farm of about 800 acres.Half his farm is{hill land {(Sidlaws)}and is covered with rough grass and heather.He keeps sheep on this land. The other half is crop land.Eleven fields are under barley;three fields are under wheat;three under peas;four under potatoes;and two under oats. He has 150 cattle which he buys in the autumn. He has a lot of machines ;more than he can use on his own farm and so he does{contracting.}The sort of things he does are as follows:- ploughing,sowing,spraying,harvesting and storing.He keeps his machinery at Burnside quarry. Roy Milne Primary 6.
